text:
Ram Baran Yadav (born 4 February 1948) is a Nepalese politician and physician. He was the 1st President of Nepal following the declaration of a republic in 2008. He was president from 23 July 2008 to 29 October 2015.
Yadav was Minister of State for Health in the 1991–1994 Nepali Congress government. He was elected to the House of Representatives in 1999.
